00047 #define Define_Network(NAME) \
00048   EXECUTE_ON_STARTUP(NAME##__net, networks.instance()->add(new NAME(#NAME));)
00049 
00055 #define Define_Channel(NAME) \
00056   EXECUTE_ON_STARTUP(NAME##__channelt, channeltypes.instance()->add(new NAME(#NAME));)
00057 
00068 #define Define_Function(NAME,ARGCOUNT) \
00069   EXECUTE_ON_STARTUP(NAME##__##ARGCOUNT##__func, functions.instance()->add(new cFunctionType(#NAME,NAME,ARGCOUNT));)
00070 
00078 #define Define_Function2(NAME,FUNCTION,ARGCOUNT) \
00079   EXECUTE_ON_STARTUP(NAME##__##ARGCOUNT##__func, functions.instance()->add(new cFunctionType(#NAME,FUNCTION,ARGCOUNT));)
00080 
00089 #define Register_Class(CLASSNAME) \
00090   cPolymorphic *CLASSNAME##__create() {return new CLASSNAME;} \
00091   EXECUTE_ON_STARTUP(CLASSNAME##__class, classes.instance()->add(new cClassRegister(#CLASSNAME,CLASSNAME##__create));)
00092 
00098 #define Register_ClassDescriptor(DESCRIPTORCLASS) \
00099   EXECUTE_ON_STARTUP(DESCRIPTORCLASS##__descr, classDescriptors.instance()->add(new DESCRIPTORCLASS());)

00122 #define Define_Module(CLASSNAME) \
00123   static cModule *CLASSNAME##__create() {return new CLASSNAME();} \
00124   EXECUTE_ON_STARTUP(CLASSNAME##__mod, modtypes.instance()->add(new cModuleType(#CLASSNAME,#CLASSNAME,(ModuleCreateFunc)CLASSNAME##__create));)
00125 
00137 #define Define_Module_Like(CLASSNAME,INTERFACENAME) \
00138   static cModule *CLASSNAME##__create() {return new CLASSNAME();} \
00139   EXECUTE_ON_STARTUP(CLASSNAME##__mod, modtypes.instance()->add(new cModuleType(#CLASSNAME,#INTERFACENAME,(ModuleCreateFunc)CLASSNAME##__create));)
00140 
00158 // TODO dummy args can be removed in a later version, when all models have been ported
00159 #define Module_Class_Members(CLASSNAME,BASECLASS,STACK) \
00160     public: \
00161       CLASSNAME(const char *dummy1=0, cModule *dummy2=0, unsigned stk=STACK) : BASECLASS(0,0,stk) {}

00164 //=========================================================================
00165 
00166 //
00167 // Internal: declaration of a module interface (module gates and params).
00168 // Example:
00169 //    ModuleInterface(CLASSNAME)
00170 //        Gate(NAME,TYPE)
00171 //        Parameter(NAME,TYPES)
00172 //    EndInterface
00173 //
00174 #define ModuleInterface(CLASSNAME)    static cModuleInterface::DeclarationItem CLASSNAME##__descr[] = {
00175 #define Gate(NAME,TYPE)         {'G', #NAME, NULL,  TYPE},
00176 #define Parameter(NAME,TYPES)   {'P', #NAME, TYPES, 0   },
00177 #define EndInterface            {'E', NULL,  NULL,  0   }};
00178 
00179 // internal: registers a module interface specified with the Interface..EndInterface macros
00180 #define Register_ModuleInterface(CLASSNAME) \
00181   EXECUTE_ON_STARTUP(CLASSNAME##__if, modinterfaces.instance()->add(new cModuleInterface(#CLASSNAME, CLASSNAME##__descr));)
00182 
00183 // internal: gate types. To be used with module interface declarations.
00184 #define GateDir_Input      'I'
00185 #define GateDir_Output     'O'
00186 
00187 // internal: parameter allowed types. To be used with module interface declarations.
00188 #define ParType_Const      "#"
00189 #define ParType_Any        "*"
00190 #define ParType_Numeric    "LDCXFTB"
00191 #define ParType_Bool       "LDCXFTB"
00192 #define ParType_String     "S"
00193 #define ParType_XML        "M"
00194 
00195 #endif
